EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_1st Annual Ping Pong Tourney_Q115.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: SaaS Ping Pong Tournament on 3/19
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the 1st Annual SaaS Ping Pong Tournament. A night of beer, pizza, flat screens to watch the 1st round of the NCAA basketball tournament and of course some ping pong! Please find the event details below:
When: Thursday, March 19, 2015 from 6-9pm Where: Pivotal, 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor, San Francisco
Follow tweets about the tournament live that day using #SaaSPingPong
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
